channel.title: Help! my client says error connecting to server, how do i change this? im new
channel.description: im trying to run a server but i cant seem to get my client to work... im so new to this, but could someone help me out? please and thanks!

item.title: Help! my client says error connecting to server, how do i change this? im new
item.dc:creator: @bears371 bears371
item.description:
@bears371 wrote:

go into the client files, now locate client.java.

right click -edit and open in notepad.

then click on edit>find and search for “server =”

in the quotes you should add in “127.0.0.1” thats your localhost. pm me if you need more help

Read full topic
